author: Nate Raymond
title: Judge allows Celgene whistleblower to be paid after bitter fee fight
text:
A federal judge has cleared the way for an ex-Celgene Corp employee to collect nearly $72.6 million as her cut of a $280 million settlement with the drugmaker after striking a lien her former law firm Grant & Eisenhofer placed on the payout.
U.S. District Judge Philip Gutierrez in Los Angeles ruled that Beverly Brownâ€™s agreement with the law firm did not comply with a California law requiring contractual language stating that the fee Grant & Eisenhofer would charge was negotiable.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2GkH25r
